title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XIII, pt. 606 - Prohibited Conduct
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XIII, pt. 606 - Prohibited Conduct

State Regulations
§ 606.1 - Assemblages, parades or demonstrations
§ 606.2 - Damaging, marking or defacing authority property
§ 606.3 - Dumping refuse and littering
§ 606.4 - Hitchhiking; loitering
§ 606.5 - Soliciting and commercial activity
§ 606.6 - Driving instruction
§ 606.7 - Transportation of dangerous materials

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XIII, pt. 606

Statutory authority: L. 1933, Ch. 824, as amd. by L. 1957, Ch. 259 and L. 1965, Ch. 659

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
